title: Northern Kings Defeated
summary: Joshua 11 recounts how Joshua leads Israel to defeat a coalition of northern kings led by Jabin of Hazor. With God’s help, Israel wins a total victory. The land finally has rest from war.

faq.question: Who led the northern coalition against Israel?
How did Joshua obey God in battle?
faq.answer: He left no survivors and destroyed the enemy’s chariots and horses as God commanded.
